creator: andres@onemileup.com
andres@onemileup.com
text:
Created attachment 15847
Patch for SVGOMAnimatedPathData.java to support NormalizedPath

This patch requieres a new Java Class: AbstractSVGNormPathSegList.java

creator: andres@onemileup.com
text:
Created attachment 15848
Implementation of the NormalizedPath

Tis Class is an Abstract Implementation of a NormalizedPath. It is required by
the Normalized Path methods from SVGOMAnimatedPathData

creator: andres@onemileup.com
text:
Created attachment 15849
SVG Test demonstrating NormalizedPath functionality

Simple SVG test that demonstrates the use of the NormalizedPath method. It has
a simple path that has all valid path elements, and a javascript function that
creates a Normalized Path and overlays it into the original, to demonstrate
that there is no loss of precision.

Tested with Batik Squigle from the 1.6 SVN branch. Using Java 1.4.2

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
This patch has been checked into SVN.
Thanks!
Sorry it took so long but it took a while
for you to pop up on the Apache CLA list
(also you are listed under Andres Antonio Toussaint Chauvet
so you weren't listed under 'T').
